programme.title: The Breed
programme.desc: A group of five college kids are forced to match wits with unwelcoming residents when they fly to a "deserted" island for a party weekend.

programme.title: Final Draft
programme.desc: An aspiring screenwriter (James Van Der Beek) is faced with a career-altering opportunity to write a new horror script. After isolating himself for days in his apartment to finish the assignment, he starts blending reality with his subconscious, but he is determined to finish: even if it kills him.

programme.title: Cruise Ship Killers
programme.desc: A vivacious young entertainer on a high-end luxury cruise draws so many admirers, jealousies start to flare. After a night of socializing, she doesn't show up for rehearsal. What really happened behind her locked cabin door?

programme.title: Cruise Ship Killers
programme.desc: A therapist known for her loving attitude goes on a cruise with her husband as they attempt to repair their strained marriage. Unfortunately, their week alone comes to a tragic end as her body falls from an upper deck. Is it all an accident, or has something more sinister taken place?

programme.title: Cruise Ship Killers
programme.desc: A millionaire widower and her teenaged daughter take a five-star cruise together. But at one of the many stops along the way, a grizzly discovery is made when crew members find the widower's body crammed into her own suitcase.

programme.title: Crime Files with David Wilson
programme.desc: Criminologist David Wilson presents fresh analysis of notorious Scottish serial killers Peter Manual and Peter Tobin and interviews criminal lawyer Donald Findlay QC.

programme.title: Crime Files with David Wilson
programme.desc: Criminologist David Wilson discussed how surveillance technology has made the good old fashioned bank robbery or jewellery raid harder than ever to pull off and not get caught.

programme.title: AI: The Last Invention
programme.desc: In the near future, we will be able to create artificial brains that will make us more powerful than ever before. The film is fictional, but is based on current research on artificial intelligence. It is the story of an AI developer, Vida, who is developing a superintelligence with the power to save or destroy humanity.

programme.title: Elon Musk: The Real Life Iron Man
programme.desc: Discover the meteoric rise of Elon Musk, the man who is transforming the way we think about travel techlogy through electric cars, the Hyperloop, andrevolutionary ideas on how we live through artificial intelligence and colonizing Mars.

programme.title: Eating Our Way to Extinction
programme.desc: Narrated by Kate Winslet, this entertaining and surprising documentary will challenge the way you look at the food industry. What is the true cost of food? Who pays the price? Featuring shocking undercover footage and poignant first-hand accounts from indigenous people, this one-of-a-kind documentary will permanently change your perception of food and its connection to the future of our planet.

programme.title: Making Contact
programme.desc: Join one man's mission to explore, document, and ultimately work towards understanding the evolving mythology of UFOs in today's world.. How far would you be willing to go, in body, mind, and heart to make contact?

programme.title: Tango Shalom
programme.desc: Cuando una bailarina de tango le pide a un rabino que participe en un concurso de baile, surge un gran problema: ¡debido a sus creencias ortodoxas, no puede tocarla! Pero el dinero del premio salvaría a su escuela de la bancarrota, por lo que desarrollan un plan para participar en la competencia sin sacrificar su fe, y los lazos de la familia y la comunidad se ponen a prueba con un deslumbrante paso de baile a la vez en esta alegre fábula.

programme.title: Runaway Romance
programme.desc: A reality TV star leaves Hollywood and finds herself in Amish country where she must decide between staying in her newfound reality or returning to her old one.

programme.title: The Silver Brumby
programme.desc: In the unforgiving wilderness of the Australian Alps, there roams a stallion like no other. Grand in stature, a beauty to behold, he is the King of all of the Cascade Brumbies. Wise in the ways of the bush, courageous and daring in the face of danger, the Silver Brumby is revered by all - including his greatest enemy - Man.

programme.title: Shred
programme.desc: Max and Eddy are washed up pro snowboarders from the '90s who ruined their careers with reckless behavior. Working as lift operators at Stubby Peaks, they decide to start a snowboard team in order to get back on top of the snowboarding scene. Kingsley Brown, their old rival and head of the National Snowboard Association, blackballs the camp trying to keep them away from the sport.

programme.title: Revenge Of The Boarding School Dropouts
programme.desc: Max and Eddie are stoner snowboarders living the life of rock stars. But all the photo shoots, video stardom, and parties are threatening the will of their snowboarding team. Their nemesis Kingsley Brown (Tom Green) and his sidekick Spinks attempt to throw a wrench into the works for Max & Eddie’s riders, but this time they have even more tricks up their sleeves.

programme.title: Axcellerator
programme.desc: When a young car thief stumbles upon the invention of the century (and the various government agencies that want to kill him), he and a sassy checkout clerk named Kate have the adventure of a lifetime.

programme.title: Elon Musk: The Real Life Iron Man
programme.desc: Discover the meteoric rise of Elon Musk, the man who is transforming the way we think about travel techlogy through electric cars, the Hyperloop, andrevolutionary ideas on how we live through artificial intelligence and colonizing Mars.
